description: These Creamy Vegan Mashed Potatoes are silky smooth and classically flavored! Â Perfect for your Thanksgiving table!
name: Creamy Vegan Mashed Potatoes
recipeIngredient: 8-10 cups peeled diced potatoes, Yukon gold or russet work best
4 tablespoons vegan butter, I like soy free Earth Balance
Salt, black pepper and granulated garlic, to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place cubed potatoes into a large pot and cover with cold water. Add a big pinch of salt (optional) and bring to a boil. Boil potatoes until fork tender, 20-25 minutes. Drain potatoes and add them back into the pot.
Add in the butter, milk and mayo and mash with a potato masher or whip with an electric hand mixer.
Season with salt, pepper and granulated garlic, to taste and serve immediately or keep warm until ready to serve! I like to garnish mine with some fresh herbs and a drizzle of melted butter.
